column1: Kata Robata////The current happy hour menu is pretty bare
column3: other blah ones I can't remember)
column5: and calamari. We ordered edamame and calamari to start with. Edamame- standard. The calamari was coated in something besides standard bread crumbs or panko
column6: it was crunchy and very good. All the pieces were huge too
column7: so we filled up a bit on that. Their dinner menu is pretty long
column10: and a set of hot rock dishes that the restaurant is named after. We only ordered rolls and seaweed salads
column11: they were pretty standard but I liked that the seaweed salad was served on a long plate instead of in a bowl.
